text: Here are the endorsements for each major candidate in the 2024 U.S. Senate election in California Barbara Lee * Rob Bonta, (Attorney General of California) (2021-present) * Malia Cohen (California State Controller) (2023-present) * Fiona Ma (Treasurer of California) (2019-present) * Tony Thurmond (California State Superintendent of Public Instruction) (2019-present) Category:2023 in the United States Category:California elections
title: 2024 endorsements in the California U.S. Senate Race
